remarks: Lemma for ~ ftc1anc - the absolute value of a real-valued measurable function is measurable.  Would be trivial with ~ cncombf , but this proof avoids ~ ax-cc .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 18-Jun-2018.)
statement: ftc1anclem1 $p |- ( ( F : A --> RR /\ F e. MblFn ) -> ( abs o. F ) e. MblFn ) $.
